ygData.msgSnippet: ... it ... Are you mistaken or just flat out lying?  It does not take close to 30 minutes for a lvl 17 warrior to heal up.  And if you grouped with a healer,
ygData.messageBody:
> Date: Fri, 11 Jun 1999 08:30:16 PDT
> From: mark mark <markerob@...>
>Subject: Re: Warriors vs Wizards
>
>I believe that warriors are necessary in a group only to the high teen-low
>twenties. When most hybrid-magic user classes get to that level they can
>either root, or get a pet that will engage the creature while he or she
>casts (wherein they usually don't need long because they deal out the most
>damage). I am a lev 17 warrior and blue cons can take me down to 1/3 hp,
it
>then takes me a half hour to heal back up.

Are you mistaken or just flat out lying? It does not take close to 30
minutes for a lvl 17 warrior to heal up. And if you grouped with a healer,
you wouldn't have to wait.

I'm not trying to be offensive, but warriors cannot solo due to the time it
takes to recover hp's. This is part of the design of the game. The higher
level you get, the harder it will be to solo. Some classes will be able to
solo longer than other classes, but eventually, every class will be forced
to solo.

And if you are only level 17, how do you know what is necessary in groups
above the mid-20's? Many people on this list state that a warrior or two is
a needed part of a high level group.



Wayne
